features: RENEWING FACE CLEANSER: Highly advanced formula with anti-aging ingredients & gentle exfoliants to regenerate & smooth skin texture for fresh skin
RICH & CREAMY: Formulated with a light fragrance, this smooth cream cleanser has gentle exfoliators that break down quickly to not remove skin’s natural moisture for a hydrated & glowing look
FORMULA FOR A CLEAN CANVAS: Ultra-fine exfoliators & powerful ingredients work on skin for an ever-so-gentle scrub that leaves skin feeling refreshingly clean
CLEANSE A.M. & P.M.: Wash face morning & night to help remove buildup of dirt, dead skin cells & pesky makeup
CLEAN & REGENERATE: Cleans deep to even skin’s surface & accelerate its surface regeneration for younger-looking skin with every wash
body.description: The perfect gift or stocking stuffer for the holiday season! Treat skin to an extra boost of cleansing power and touchable freshness morning and night. Discover Olay Regenerist Regenerating Cream Face Cleanser — a rich formula that exfoliates, regenerates and smooths skin’s texture. This face cleanser deep cleans while improving skin texture by speeding up natural surface regeneration. Plus, it’s supercharged with anti-aging Amino-Peptide Complex and exfoliants to help you experience an instant detox without over drying skin. Use Olay daily and see skin transformation in 28 days. Regenerating Cream Face Cleanser is the first step in your daily skincare regimen. This facial exfoliating cleanser is suitable for daily use and can be used in the morning, before applying makeup, and at night.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Regenerist is Olay’s Advanced Anti-Aging Collection. The supercharged Regenerist formulas, with key anti-aging ingredients like amino-peptides, are engineered to regenerate surface skin cells and deliver visible, transformative results for younger-looking skin. Advanced Anti-Aging Formula Olay Regenerist Regenerating Cream Face Cleanser exfoliates, regenerates and smoothes skin texture. This face cleanser deep cleans while improving skin tone by speeding up natural surface regeneration. Supercharged with anti-aging Amino-Peptide Complex and exfoliants, experience an instant detox and a refreshing clean without overdrying skin.

Science, Ingredients, Results & Regimen Science: Olay analyzed over 70,000 genomic samples for over 17 years and discovered that about 10% of women naturally look years younger. Inspired by this discovery, Olay re-engineered its products to help take years off your visual skin age, delivering visible, transformative results.* *P&G Technical Studies, 1999-2016. Ingredients: Designed with key anti-aging ingredients and gentle exfoliating crystals, this creamy face wash immediately cleans, instantly detoxifies and improves skin texture without overdrying. It works for most skin types to speed skin’s natural regeneration while smoothing. With Olay Regenerist, everybody has the chance to look younger, not just the 10%. Results: 94% of women felt smoother, cleaner skin in one use. Experience a facial cleanser that gently exfoliates skin to accelerate skin’s natural surface regeneration for smoother-feeling skin. It’s the perfect way to begin and end every day for a beautifully regenerated appearance. *P&G Technical Studies, 2011 Regimen: Regenerating Cream Face Cleanser is the first step in your daily skincare regimen. Use Olay Regenerist moisturizers, concentrates and treatments after cleansing skin. This facial exfoliating cleanser is suitable for daily use and can be used in the morning, before applying makeup, and at night.

Regenerist Regenerating Cream Face Cleanser Regenerist Miracle Boost Concentrate Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Eye Swirl Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream Regenerist Micro-Sculpting Cream SPF 30 Regimen Step Step 1: Cleanse Step 2: Prepare Step 3: Treat Step 4: Moisturize Step 4: Day Moisturize + SPF Product Type Cream Cleanser Add to Moisturizer: Ultra-Lightweight Concentrate To Boost Your Moisturizer Eye Treatment Rich Cream Lightweight SPF Lotion Product Description Instantly cleans, refreshes & improves skin texture without overdrying Instantly smoothes skin’s texture PLUS delivers 60% more anti-aging ingredients when paired with Micro-Sculpting Cream Instantly smoothes, brightens and reduces the look of fine lines and wrinkles Visibly plumps, firms & corrects the look of wrinkles Visibly plumps, firms & protects against UVA/UVB rays Available in Lightly-Scented Fragrance-Free Lightly-Scented Scented; Fragrance-Free Scented

Find the Right Collection for Your Skin Luminous formulas, with advanced tone-correcting ingredients like niacinamide and glycerin, are designed to visibly brighten skin and even tone. Total Effects formulas, with nourishing ingredients like vitamins and antioxidants, give seven benefits in one to help fight signs of aging for younger-looking skin. ProX formulas, with ingredients like pro-retinol and amino peptides, offer proven skincare solutions to target root causes of aging for healthy-looking skin. The Olay Eyes Collection is specifically formulated for the delicate eye area to fight virtually every eye concern: dark circles, puffy eyes, fine lines and under eye wrinkles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Olay did well with this cleanser. I love having the 3 pack to store in different places. Scent is lovely. Skin always looks clean, soft, moisturized, and refreshed without a residue after rinsing. It's wonderful to be alive in a time where we have these products, and they actually work.

reviews.reviewText: My mother used it and now I do.

reviews.reviewText: I ordered this for my wife because she couldn’t find it anywhere locally.She uses it every day so now she has a good supply.Happy wife happy life.
